pages.text: Vi not those pretend ke ili hav kred en ki revealed vi en ki revealed antaux vi est tiam uphold unjust legx their idols? Ili komand reject such legx! Ja est diabl wish plumb them far astray
When ili told Ven ki DI revealed messenger vi vid hypocrites shunning vi completely
Kiel gxi do gxi when disaster est hits them as consequence their own works Ili ven vi tiam jxur DI Our intentions est bon righteous
DI est fully aware da their innermost intentions Vi ignor them enlighten them don them bon advice sav their anim
Ni ne send any messenger escept obe en accordance kun di testament Hav ili when ili wronged their anim ven vi pregx DI forgiveness messenger pregx their forgiveness ili trov DI Redeemer Merciful
Neniam ja per your Lord ili ne est believers ili ven vi jugx their disput tiam trov hesitation their kor whatsoever en akcept your judgment Ili submit total submission
